articles.title: From a ‘Boyfriend Pillow' to Pheromone Perfume, These Cuffing Season Products Promise to Help You ...
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Brands have released a number of new products designed to enhance user connectivity.

articles.title: 35 Products With Stunning Before-And-Afters That Say Everything You Need To Know
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features Lumify Eye Drops, a product that reduces redness in eyes, and Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, formulated to hydrate and tighten skin. It also includes Clinique's tinted lip balm, a product that gives a subtly polished effect, and E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, which uses tubing technology to wrap around lashes.

articles.title: This Adorable Tiny Tent Lets You Take Your Pets Camping
articles.summary: REI Co-op has launched the Half Dome Tiny Tent, a miniature version of their popular Half Dome tent designed for small pets. The tent, weighing just half a pound, mirrors the original's design and is available for $34.95 online.

articles.title: Best Mascaras in India for Bold, Beautiful Lashes – Top 4 You Must Try!
articles.summary: Blue Heaven introduces the 10X Volumising Mascara for increased lash volume. Maybelline launches the Sky High Mascara, a waterproof and smudge-proof formula for dramatic results. Lakmé offers the Eyeconic Curling Mascara for daily lash curl, while Renee presents the Volumax Mascara, a quick-dry, waterproof option for on-the-go volume.

articles.title: Watch: NEO humanoid robot does your chores and learns new skills
articles.author: Neetika Walter
articles.summary: Robotics firm 1X has launched preorders for NEO, a consumer-ready humanoid robot designed for household chores and personal assistance. NEO features include voice and app-controlled task management, a built-in LLM for conversation, and a proprietary AI model. It will ship in 2026, priced at $20,000 or via a $499/month subscription, initially in the U.S.

articles.title: Is Noomez a Good Investment?: Early Buyers React as the Presale Opens Live
articles.summary: Noomez ($NNZ) is launching a presale with a unique "Noom Gauge" system that tracks buy volume and burns unsold tokens in each stage.  The platform already has two functional systems, Noom Rewards (a staking system) and Noom Engine (automatic distribution of partner tokens), deployed before listing on PancakeSwap. The presale consists of 28 stages and all smart contracts (token, staking, gauge, engine) are live.

articles.title: I Tested 8 Fabric Shavers — These Are the Ones That Actually Worked: Ranked
articles.author: Annie Shigo
articles.summary: The article reviews several fabric shavers, including models with features like adjustable settings, multiple blades, and varying power sources (rechargeable or battery-powered).  The reviews assess the fabric shaver's ease of use, efficiency in removing pills, volume, and ease of cleaning, providing insights into their performance on different fabric types.

articles.title: Acer and Metropolitan redefine innovation: Next@Acer 2025 showcases technology future in Sri Lanka
articles.summary: Metropolitan Technologies Ltd., as the authorized distributor for Acer, introduced Acer's latest lineup of laptops, AI-powered devices, and productivity devices at Next@Acer: Sri Lanka 2025. Key products launched included the Acer Swift Air, Acer Swift Edge 14 AI, Swift 14 AI, Predator Helios Neo 16 AI, and Predator Helios 18 AI, along with portable single and dual-display monitors.

articles.title: MyRegistry.com Launches a Game-Changing Gift Registry and Gift List App Just in Time for the ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: MyRegistry.com launched a redesigned mobile application. The new app combines a modern design with advanced AI search and personalization features. The app enables seamless sharing and smarter gift discovery for connected consumers.

articles.title: I Tried The Viral Arby's Steak Nuggets — Here's My Honest Review
articles.author: Dannica Ramirez
articles.summary: Arby's launched a limited-time menu item called Steak Nuggets on October 6, 2025, available nationwide. The Steak Nuggets are described as tender, juicy, hand-cut pieces of steak seasoned with garlic and pepper and come in 5- or 9-piece counts. They can be ordered alone or as part of a Steak Nugget Sandwich or Bowl.

articles.title: This Makeup Organizer Solved My Small-Bathroom Problems
articles.author: Janie Campbell
articles.summary: The article features a variety of makeup organizers, including the Ocheal large makeup organizer, which has customizable dividers and a waterproof fabric, available on Amazon. Also highlighted is the BÉIS cosmetics case, which has a storage pocket for its mirror and a removable brush holder. Other brands such as Tartan + Twine and Bagsmart are also mentioned.

articles.title: Exploring Career Opportunities with My Kelly Jobs: Insights from a Content Writer
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: My Kelly Jobs connects businesses with content writers for various project-based work including blog posts, website content, social media content, articles, and copywriting. The platform allows freelance writers to build a flexible career with access to diverse project opportunities and direct client communication. An example includes writing SEO-optimized blog posts for a SaaS company focused on project management, secured through My Kelly Jobs.

articles.title: Olorama offers the most realistic burning powder​ scent in the world
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Olorama Technology has introduced a new digital scent innovation that replicates the realistic burning powder scent. This technology allows creators to add the aroma of gunfire to films, VR, games, and live events by capturing the exact gases released during gunpowder combustion. Olorama's scent simulators can trigger scents through API, DMX, or voice commands.

articles.title: Journey to the Edge of the Universe: Exploring Extraordinary Cosmic Phenomena and the Limits of Human Understanding
articles.summary: 1X has launched NEO, a humanoid robot designed for personalized home assistance and performing everyday chores. NEO is equipped with advanced sensor suites for safety and is intended to integrate with smart home ecosystems. The robot is now available and aims to enhance quality of life through practical assistance.

articles.title: Galaxy vs. iPhone vs. Pixel: Camera Wars Worth Billions?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Apple is investing heavily in AI development for future products. The company's future success will depend on its ability to deliver AI that aligns with its reputation for simplicity and user-friendliness in the future iPhone series, like the iPhone 17.

articles.title: Peter Thomas Roth's Whipped Cream Cleanser is dessert for your dermis
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Peter Thomas Roth launched Water Drench Hyaluronic Whipped Cream Cleanser, a cleanser featuring hyaluronic acid, sunflower seed oil, coconut acid, apple extract, pro-vitamin B5, and shea butter. The cleanser transforms from a whipped cloud texture into a creamy lather, effectively removing dirt and makeup, and providing hydration.

articles.title: McDonald's blends bold and cool in its latest limited-edition sauce
articles.author: Kaylee Remington
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new Buffalo Ranch Sauce nationwide for a limited time, described as a 'mild-meets-wild' flavor combining buffalo sauce and ranch. The sauce will be featured in new menu items like the Buffalo Ranch Snack Wrap, Bacon Buffalo Ranch McCrispy, Bacon Buffalo Ranch Deluxe McCrispy, and McCrispy Strips with Buffalo Ranch Dip Cups. Customers can also order the sauce on the side to add to other menu items.

articles.title: Nuvoton Puts Tiny AI Inside A Microcontroller
articles.author: Ron Schmelzer
articles.summary: Nuvoton has released a new microcontroller chip, the NuMicro M55M1, which pairs an Arm Cortex M55 CPU with an Arm Ethos U55 'neural processing unit'. This chip allows devices to handle AI tasks like voice triggers and hand gestures without needing cloud access. The companion NuEzAI M55M1 development board helps developers build, compile, and test on hardware.

articles.title: 1X Launches NEO: The Robot Redefining Life at Home
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: 1X has announced the pre-order launch of NEO, a consumer-ready humanoid robot. NEO is designed to automate everyday chores and provide personalized assistance for home users.

articles.title: I Tried the First Humanoid Home Robot. It Was Wild.
articles.summary: The 1X Neo, a humanoid robot, can perform household tasks such as doing dishes, cleaning the kitchen, and folding laundry. WSJ's Joanna Stern evaluated the robot and its creator to assess its capabilities and reliance on human assistance.

articles.title: Meet the humanoid robot headed for homes
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching pre-orders for its new home robot, Neo, with shipments planned for next year. The robot is priced at $20,000 or a subscription of $499 per month and will come in multiple color options. Neo aims to handle household tasks, with 1X emphasizing its long-term development and continuous feature updates.

articles.title: Graphic design is AI passion.
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Adobe Express showcased its new AI assistant during the Max keynote. This AI assistant can edit designs, demonstrated through a live demonstration. This highlights the introduction of new AI-powered capabilities to Adobe's creative tools.

articles.title: Padilla Launches New Service to Improve GenAI Search Results: Padilla GEO 3D
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Padilla, a public relations and marketing firm, has launched Padilla GEO 3D. This new service enhances generative AI search results for brands and organizations through a three-pronged generative engine optimization approach.

articles.title: It's Time for Beauty Brands in Asia to Have a Marketing Makeover
articles.author: Martin Machinandiarena
articles.summary: Mandom launched Levata, a new men's hair care brand, with a 'Meditation Shampoo' concept, partnering with Pinterest to build brand awareness. 3CE introduced an AI-powered color diagnosis tool on Shopee, allowing consumers to test and buy their ideal shades within a virtual shopping experience.

articles.title: Frozen Gyoza With a Cult Following Comes to Colorado, Is It Worth the Hype?
articles.author: Sara Rosenthal
articles.summary: Ajinomoto, Japan's number-one frozen gyoza brand, has launched its hane-style dumplings in grocery stores across the United States, including Walmart and King Soopers locations. The brand is hosting pop-up events in Denver to promote the product, which features a crispy, lacy skirt formed during cooking and offers consumers a new dumpling experience at home.

articles.title: From Screens to Scenes, LG's AI TVs bring life, comfort, connection together
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria launched its latest range of AI Smart TVs, including OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models, showcasing LG ThinQ AI capabilities. In partnership with Ecobank Nigeria, LG introduced a flexible Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) Scheme to enhance accessibility and affordability of LG Smart TVs and appliances.

articles.title: OPPO Find X9 Series Launches Globally, Redefining Flagship Experience with 200MP Hasselblad Telephoto, 7000+mAh Battery, Top-Tier Performance, and ColorOS 16
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: OPPO has announced the global availability of its newest flagship smartphones, the Find X9 and Find X9 Pro. The series features a camera system co-engineered with Hasselblad, extended battery life, powerful performance, and ColorOS 16.

articles.title: Agentic Commerce Is Here. Is Your Business Ready to Accept AI-Driven Transactions?
articles.author: Aurelie Guerrieri on
articles.summary: Google has introduced agentic checkout through Search and Gemini. Amazon is piloting 'Buy for Me' powered by Nova and Claude. Perplexity users can complete bookings and purchases via PayPal and Venmo without ever leaving the chat. Furthermore, DataDome offers visibility and control over AI agents and LLM traffic, AI monetization options, MCP Protection, and real-time intent-based detection to help companies adopt agentic commerce.

articles.title: Sleep easy: Give your bed a makeover with a topper or mattress
articles.author: Kya Delongchamps
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of mattress toppers from different companies. Sleepeeze offers the Empress topper with wool and latex, while Emma offers premium toppers with thermal regulating foam, and Arnotts offers feather and down toppers. Other brands mentioned include Ikea with wool toppers, Greener Me (Baavet Bedding) with Irish wool protectors, Jysk with memory foam toppers, and HomeStore+More with anti-allergen cluster-fill fibre toppers.

articles.title: Fed up with clothes smelling damp? Five easy tips to tackle it & why it's all about the ‘flipping' method
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: AO suggests using a dehumidifier as a great alternative if there is no space or budget for a tumble dryer. Dehumidifiers help dry clothes faster by removing moisture from the air, uses less energy and makes the room feel warmer.

articles.title: NYC BUD pays homage to Grand Central with opening of new Manhattan cannabis dispensary
articles.author: Emily Davenport
articles.summary: NYC BUD has launched its second cannabis dispensary location in Midtown, Manhattan. The new store features a Grand Central Station theme, a curated selection of cannabis products including flower, vapes, and edibles, and aims to support local artists by providing a platform to showcase their work.

articles.title: Namaqua Wines rebrands distribution arm in response to market trends
articles.author: CBN
articles.summary: Namaqua Wines' distribution division has rebranded to Niew Beverages to adapt to changing market trends. Niew Beverages aims to expand its portfolio, welcoming a premium spirit portfolio from Sazerac including BuzzBallz and cater to new segments like no-and-low alcohol consumers. This expansion creates room for greater innovation and premiumisation in the beverage landscape.

articles.title: Introducing the Singular Vape Platform
articles.summary: ACTIVE has launched Singular, a modular vape platform. It features interchangeable pods and batteries, custom designs and various capacity selections. The product is engineered for any extract and to scale across different markets.

articles.title: This popular Shark vacuum is almost 50% — less than it was on Prime Day
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: Shark's Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe upright vacuum, a popular appliance, is currently on sale for almost 50% off, making it cheaper than during previous Prime Day events. The vacuum features swivel steering, a detachable pod for handheld use, a HEPA filter, and comes with crevice and upholstery tools.

articles.title: Forging a lifestyle of influence, connection, legacy with Platinum GPlan
articles.summary: Globe Platinum has launched the All-new Platinum GPlan, a premium suite of mobile services providing unlimited data, priority network access, and a dedicated digital concierge. Subscribers can upgrade to the latest flagship devices like the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold or Z Flip after 12 months through Flagship Forever and enjoy Rewards Forever, redeeming points anytime.

articles.title: 42 Products I Wish Everyone Knew About
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Hanni Shave Pillow, a showerless shave gel, is introduced as a product for convenient shaving without needing a shower. The Aerflo System is presented as a portable water carbonator, enabling on-the-go fizzy drinks. Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush offers sun protection with light coverage, while Wet n Wild lipstick is highlighted for its quality and affordability. Capri Blue Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner allows consumers to clean while enjoying the signature Anthropologie scent.

articles.title: Got2b's £4.50 dry shampoo mist is a game-changer for greasy hair days
articles.author: Kat Romero
articles.summary: got2b has introduced the getFRESH Dry Shampoo Hair Mist, priced at £4.50, offering an instant cleanse with a rice starch-infused formula, up to 24 hours of anti-grease power, and a bergamot and freesia scent. User reviews and beauty influencers are praising the product as a dupe for K18's dry shampoo, highlighting its volume-boosting and residue-free properties.

articles.title: Mountain Peak Soap Company celebrates grand opening in Friendsville
articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.summary: Mountain Peak Soap Company celebrated its grand opening in Friendsville. The company offers artisan soap and bath products. Connor Norman praised the company for its commitment to quality craftsmanship and local entrepreneurship.

articles.title: McDonald's rolls out new Buffalo ranch sauce and seasonal treats
articles.author: Pamela Silvestri
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching new menu items including Buffalo Ranch Sauce, available with offerings like the Buffalo Ranch Snack Wrap and McCrispy variations, and the CHIPS AHOY! Frappé starting November 3rd. The company also brought back Happy Meal Boo Buckets on October 21st, featuring new Cat and Zombie designs alongside classic options.

articles.title: I unboxed the $335 Lush advent calendar — it's brimming with bath products and worth every penny
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Lush is launching its 2025 limited-edition Advent Calendar, priced at $335. The calendar includes 25 Lush products such as bath bombs, soaps, bubble bars, shower gels, and scented candles, with many full-sized products. The packaging is a reusable gift box illustrated by an Artbox artist.

articles.title: Zaxbys launches new holiday shake! What is it like and when will it be available?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Zaxby's has introduced the Cookie Butter Shake, a limited-time holiday milkshake featuring cinnamon syrup, cookie bits, whipped cream, and a cherry, available starting November 3, 2025. The company has also expanded its Asian Zensation menu, which includes the Asian Zensation Zalad, Giant Asian Zensation Wrap, and Sweet Asian Glazed Chicken Finger Plate.

articles.title: New England Brewing Co. to release first 12-pack format; Branford move unlocks new capabilities
articles.author: Andrew Larson
articles.summary: New England Brewing Co. (NEBCO) is launching its first 12-pack of canned beer, featuring Sea Hag ($18.99) and Fuzzy Baby Ducks ($19.99). NEBCO Lager will join the lineup in 2026 at $18.99. This release became possible after NEBCO moved production to a larger Branford facility.

articles.title: Treasure Data Introduces AI Marketing Cloud to Power Agentic Customer Engagement
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Treasure Data launched Treasure Data AI Marketing Cloud, unifying customer data, AI agents, and intelligent activation for personalized experiences. The platform includes suites for lifecycle marketers, brand marketers, and web experience marketers, with AI-driven insights and automation. Qualified companies can access AI Suites free for 60 days and benefit from the Trade-Up program.

articles.title: RepairPal Archives
articles.author: Scooter Doll
articles.summary: Slate, an American EV brand, confirmed its flagship vehicle will use the North American Charging Standard (NACS) for Tesla Supercharger network access. The company also secured a national service partner to support its vehicles after customer delivery, indicating the launch of the new product and service.

articles.title: Amazon Says These Are the Most Giftable Items of the Season: Shop Our Favorites
articles.author: Shannon Garlin
articles.summary: Amazon is helping customers with gift-giving through shopping innovations and a new AI assistant, Rufus. It provides several gift options, including beauty gifts, pre-holiday gifts, gifts for teens, Advent calendars, toys, reading gadgets, and fashion gifts.

articles.title: Reddit Partners With G2 to Help Software Brands Reach Reddit Users
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit has partnered with G2 to allow software developers listed on G2 to extend their brand presence on Reddit through Reddit Pro accounts. This initiative provides eligible G2 businesses with access to Reddit's insights tools and allows them to use G2 data to improve ad placement and engagement, enabling them to connect with potential customers and participate in relevant conversations within Reddit communities.

articles.title: Google Launches AI Tool to Assist SMBs in Creating Brand Promotions
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google launched 'Pomelli,' a new AI platform designed to help SMBs create better-looking brand promotions. The platform analyzes websites to extract brand identity, generates tailored campaign ideas, and creates platform-specific promotions. Pomelli is launching today in public beta experiment in the U.S., Canada, Australia and New Zealand in English.

articles.title: The Trader Joe's Pasta That Reddit Ranks '100/10'
articles.author: Nikki Munoz
articles.summary: Trader Joe's Goat Cheese & Caramelized Onion Ravioli features extra thin pasta sheets filled with tart goat cheese and sweet, caramelized onions. This quick-cooking pasta dish costs about $4 and has received high praise from customers. Many TJ's fans have shared various ways of serving the ravioli, including with browned butter, Italian sausage, olive oil, ricotta, pesto, or Trader Joe's Autumnal Harvest Creamy Pasta Sauce.

articles.title: Coming in 2027: Xbox Ditches $60 Annual Fee and Makes The Move to Windows
articles.author: Al Landes
articles.summary: Microsoft is reportedly planning to launch a next-generation Xbox console in 2027 with full Windows support and improved hardware, potentially surpassing current and future PlayStation consoles. They are also developing the Xbox Ally handheld, a Windows-based device aimed at providing console simplicity, and committed to full native backward compatibility for all existing Xbox games on the new console.

articles.title: Samsung, Google reveal all-in-one device for work and play
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: Samsung and Google introduced the Galaxy XR headset, priced at $1,799, running on Android XR and integrating Gemini AI for spatial computing and immersive experiences. The headset offers features like 3D navigation, voice/gesture control, and real-time app management, aiming to extend Android beyond phones for work, entertainment, and search.

articles.title: MyRegistry.com Launches a Game-Changing Gift Registry and Gift List App Just in Time for the Holiday Season
articles.author: My Registry.com
articles.summary: MyRegistry.com has launched a redesigned mobile application, featuring a modern design, AI search, and personalization. The new platform enhances gift list creation, management, and sharing, optimized for AI-driven personalization and scalable product innovation.

articles.title: Magellan Solutions USA Introduces Ferdinand: The Future of AI Customer Support
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Magellan Solutions USA has launched Ferdinand, an AI customer service agent designed to integrate with human teams. Ferdinand manages everyday inquiries with natural conversational fluency, looping in human agents for complex issues, and integrates smoothly into existing workflows, managing live chat, email and voice channels. The AI agent aims to provide fast, reliable, and personalized customer support across various industries, including healthcare, utilities, and e-commerce.

articles.title: Magellan Solutions USA Introduces Ferdinand: The Future of AI Customer Support
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Magellan Solutions USA has launched Ferdinand, an AI customer service agent, that integrates with human teams. Ferdinand manages everyday inquiries while looping in human agents for complex situations, delivering consistent and compassionate service across various industries like healthcare, utilities, and financial services.

articles.title: Magellan Solutions USA Introduces Ferdinand: The Future of AI Customer Support
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Magellan Solutions USA has launched Ferdinand, an AI customer service agent designed to integrate with human teams. Ferdinand manages inquiries and provides solutions via chat, email and voice, while seamlessly handing off complex tasks to human agents for a hybrid approach. This service aims to improve customer satisfaction and streamline processes across industries like healthcare, utilities, and e-commerce.

articles.title: Talk to ChatGPT without closing KakaoTalk
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Kakao launched ChatGPT for Kakao, embedding OpenAI's chatbot into KakaoTalk. They also unveiled Kakao Tools, an AI agent platform, and introduced Kanana in KakaoTalk, a conversational AI undergoing pilot testing. Kakao plans to restore the original list-style layout of the KakaoTalk Friends tab within the fourth quarter.

articles.title: Home Depot is slashing prices on washers & dryers — get up to $900 off (or more)
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Home Depot is offering discounts on washers and dryers from brands such as LG, Samsung, Maytag, GE, and Whirlpool, with savings up to $900 or more. Customers can also benefit from rebates up to $3,000 and additional savings when purchasing sets or multiple units of select models. For example, buying a Samsung washer and dryer can save up to $400 on select models, while LG washer and dryer purchases can save up to $500.

articles.title: Lightspeed Commerce Unveils Q2 Product Innovations, Including AI Showroom, Designed to Empower Independent Businesses Globally
articles.author: Mississippi Business Journal
articles.summary: Lightspeed Commerce Inc. is delivering next-generation AI features. These features are designed to help merchants grow, compete, and streamline operations.

articles.title: Reusables.com Awarded Patent for Tap-to-Reuse\u2122 Technology, Deposit-Free Container Tracking System
articles.author: Mississippi Business Journal
articles.summary: Reusables.com launched new technology eliminating operational barriers preventing widespread adoption of sustainable packaging in mainstream retail.

articles.title: Caliwater Expands into On-Premise Foodservice Locations Nationwide
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Caliwater, a cactus water brand, is expanding into restaurants and foodservice locations, following its retail launch at Walmart. The beverage is now available in Gordon Ramsay's restaurants and will be available at Pura Vida starting November 5, 2025. Caliwater is offered in flavors including Wild Prickly Pear, Watermelon, Pineapple, Ginger + Lime, and Peach Mango, and also in ready-to-drink (RTD) formats.

articles.title: 'This £22 floral hair mist revives my locks and keeps them fresh between washes'
articles.author: editorial@examiner.co.uk
articles.summary: Maria Nila has introduced the Floral Drift Hair Mist, a hair fragrance mist designed to refresh hair between washes with a floral scent. Rare Beauty offers a mini Body and Hair Fragrance Mist as an alternative, while Rituals offers a Karma Ritual spray with lotus flower and white tea scent.

articles.title: Stallion expands MG lineup in Nigeria with new models
articles.author: Juliet Onyema
articles.summary: Stallion Group has launched four new MG models in Nigeria: the MG RX9, RX5, MG5 CNG (bi-fuel), and MG T60 pickup. The RX9 is a luxury flagship SUV, the RX5 is a compact SUV, the MG5 CNG is an environmentally friendly alternative fuel vehicle, and the MG T60 is a versatile pickup truck. These models aim to meet the growing demand for versatile, fuel-efficient vehicles in Nigeria.

articles.title: Samsung shows off its trifold phone in person
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Samsung showcased a trifold phone prototype at the APEC summit. The company plans to release this next-generation device to users later this year, although the showcased version may not be the final hardware.

articles.title: How Walmart And ChatGPT Are Pioneering The AI Shopping Experience
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Walmart is partnering with ChatGPT to redefine the AI shopping experience. This collaboration suggests an update or introduction of a new AI-driven service for online retail.

articles.title: Maxol launches new delivery service alongside American-style conveyor car wash
articles.summary: Maxol is launching a new meal delivery service in Ireland in partnership with Noahs, offering cooked-to-order meals. Maxol is also rolling out an American-style conveyor car wash technology at several locations. The meal delivery service is trialled at three Maxol locations.

articles.title: Amaze Partners with Perez Hilton to Power His Storefront with New "Amaze Moments' AI Engine
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings, Inc. has launched Amaze Moments, an adaptive AI infrastructure integrated into their platform. Perez Hilton is among the first users to utilize Amaze Moments to transform fan data into real-time product collections, including exclusive merchandise inspired by his viral catchphrases. The new feature allows creators to make data-informed decisions to better connect with their fans through commerce.

articles.title: Jetour launches the G700 plug-in hybrid: Discover its innovative technology
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Jetour unveiled its new G700 plug-in hybrid car. The car promises off-road capabilities.

articles.title: How Walmart And ChatGPT Are Pioneering The AI Shopping Experience
articles.author: Dan Gingiss
articles.summary: Walmart is partnering with OpenAI to allow customers to purchase products directly within the ChatGPT chatbot. Starting in the next few months, U.S.-based ChatGPT users will be able to buy nearly every Walmart online product, except fresh food, using Instant Checkout. This partnership aims to transform the online shopping experience by combining Walmart's retail capabilities with AI.

articles.title: BT 'exploring low cost mobile brand' to rival Revolut and Monzo plans
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: BT is exploring launching a new low-cost mobile brand to compete with Revolut and Monzo. The company is considering creating a new brand or acquiring an existing mobile network operator. This initiative is driven by BT Group chief executive, Allison Kirkby, with the support of billionaire Sunil Bharti Mittal.

articles.title: Trademark Engine Launches Headless API to Power Trademark Registrations, Searches, and Monitoring for Partner Platforms
articles.summary: Trademark Engine launched its Headless API Platform, enabling partners to integrate trademark registration and brand protection capabilities into their platforms. This API offers trademark registration, searches, and monitoring features, supporting various sectors like e-commerce and AI tools. It also integrates with AI systems for automated name review and brand watch.

articles.title: The Growing Popularity of Nicotine Free Vaping Worldwide
articles.author: Dipo Olowookere
articles.summary: Nicotine-free vapes have emerged as a popular alternative to traditional vaping, offering consumers a wide array of flavors and advanced vaping devices with reliable batteries and improved airflow. This product caters to health-conscious individuals and provides a transitional tool for quitting smoking by allowing users to maintain the vaping ritual without nicotine, focusing on flavor and social aspects.

articles.title: Joy Personal Care and Sanya Malhotra reimagines a traditional 'bride-seeing' scenario with a modern twist
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Joy Personal Care launched a refreshed campaign. The campaign features actor Sanya Malhotra and promotes the Skin Fruits Moisturising Cream.

articles.title: Body Lotion to Beat Winter Dryness & Lock in Moisture
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Amazon introduces a variety of body lotions, including mCaffeine Summer Breeze Lotion, NIVEA Nourishing Body Milk, Plum BodyLovin' Vanilla Caramello Body Lotion, and Vaseline Cocoa Glow Serum-In-Lotion. These lotions offer various benefits such as deep hydration, refreshing scents, and skin-enhancing properties, catering to different skincare needs and preferences.

articles.title: Ugg Just Made the Campground-Ready Crocs Alternative I Never Saw Coming
articles.author: Sean Tirman
articles.summary: Ugg has introduced the Classic Ultra Mini Wrap Tech, a new mid-height bootie-style slip-on. While based on the existing Classic Mini, the Ultra Mini Wrap Tech is largely unrecognizable when placed side by side with its predecessor, offering a more capable and stylish design.

articles.title: UAE's beauty revolution: Is AI turning shoppers into experts?
articles.author: Nida Sohail
articles.summary: Chalhoub Group and FACES launched Layla AI, a generative AI-powered beauty coach, delivering personalized recommendations across skincare, makeup, fragrance, and haircare. Perfect Corp. introduced AgileHand technology enhancing digital try-on experiences and Perfect Beauty Agent offering 24/7 expert advice. These AI advancements are revolutionizing the beauty industry by personalizing the consumer experience.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy XR: Opening New Worlds
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy XR, a new AI-native device built on the Android XR platform, designed to deliver immersive experiences. The Galaxy XR, powered by the Snapdragon XR2+ Gen 2 platform and featuring Gemini AI, opens new dimensions for discovery, entertainment, and enterprise applications, and it will be available starting October 21 in the US and October 22 in Korea.

articles.title: Newton Golf Launches NewtonGolf.jp, Expanding Direct-to-Consumer Presence in Japan
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Newton launched a new online platform. The platform delivers premium performance equipment to Japanese golfers.

articles.title: Top Tech: Sky Sports fans race to bag £120 discount and £1 add-on in flash sale
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Sky Sports has launched a flash sale on its Essential TV, Sky Sports, and UHD package, offering it for £36 per month. This deal includes full Sky Sports coverage, Ultra HD features, and free Netflix and Discovery+ subscriptions. Sky customers also have the option to personalize their package with additional features like Sky Cinema and TNT Sports.

articles.title: Newton Golf Launches NewtonGolf.jp, Expanding Direct-to-Consumer Presence in Japan
articles.author: Newton Golf Company
articles.summary: Newton Golf Company launched its Japanese e-commerce site, www.newtongolf.jp, on October 28, 2025. This new platform enables golfers in Japan to directly purchase Newton's golf equipment. The launch reflects the growing global demand for Newton's products and aims to capitalize on the increasing golf participation in Japan.

articles.title: Horizon3.ai Integrates NodeZero® with ServiceNow Vulnerability Response to Drive Risk-Based Remediation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Horizon3.ai has launched its NodeZero® integration with ServiceNow Vulnerability Response (VR). This integration allows customers to automatically send information about exploitable weaknesses identified by NodeZero directly within the ServiceNow AI Platform. This aims to streamline the remediation workflow for organizations.

articles.title: Practical and thoughtful baby shower gifts: Strollers, slippers, diaper bags and more
articles.author: Bethany Braun-Silva
articles.summary: Bugaboo introduces the Kangaroo 2-in-1 stroller. Spanx launches the AirEssentials Half Zip sweatshirt, featuring light-as-air fabric with 4-way stretch, available in 14 colors and sizes XS to 3X.

articles.title: Reimagining Nail Care: Turning Self-Care Into an Engine for Equity
articles.author: Tony Tjan
articles.summary: MiniLuxe is focused on growing their salon business and has developed a product line of MiniLuxe 8-free polishes and nail treatments, including their Environmental Working Group (EWG)-certified and best-selling cuticle oil, and recently launched hand cream, all made in the USA. MiniLuxe integrates these proprietary MiniLuxe products seamlessly into the overall brand experience, prioritizing better-for-you, clean formulations in-house.

articles.title: You can tell Adobe Express's new AI assistant to edit your designs for you
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Adobe is launching the 'AI Assistant in Adobe Express' in public beta, a conversational creative agent designed to help users quickly create visual content. The AI assistant feature, accessible within the Adobe Express web app, allows users to generate and edit designs using natural language prompts and can also create an entire design. Furthermore, Adobe plans to integrate conversational AI assistants across its wider product ecosystem, including a similar chatbot-style editor for Photoshop.

articles.title: Wendy's Canada Introduces Bold Hamburger Innovation with New Bull's-Eye BBQ Cheeseburger – The Ultimate Sweet & Smoky Indulgence
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Wendy's Canada is launching the Bull's-Eye BBQ Cheeseburger nationwide from November 3 to December 21. This limited-time offer features a square hamburger patty with Applewood smoked bacon, crispy onions, cheese, mayonnaise, and a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce on a brioche bun.

articles.title: Just Launched
articles.author: Fashion Capital
articles.summary: New Commodity, a surplus textile brand, is launching a collaborative wash bag range with skincare brand myskinfeels on October 28, 2025. The range is Made in the UK at Fashion-Enter Ltd's ethical factory.

articles.title: Google's Generative Search Upends SEO Models, DBWD's GEO Framework Offers a Path to Recovery
articles.summary: DBWD introduces a new Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) framework designed to assist organizations in adapting their content strategies to generative search. This framework focuses on improving extractability, strengthening entity signals, and broadening analytics to include generative visibility indicators. The GEO framework complements existing SEO investments by helping companies optimize their content for AI-powered search results.

articles.title: Forget filters; Snapchat just turned AR into a full-time job
articles.author: Shajan Kumar
articles.summary: Snapchat has launched Lens Creator Rewards, a monetization system for AR lens creators. The program includes Top Performer Payouts, rewarding lenses that reach 15,000 qualified posters in 90 days, and Lens+ Payouts, offering paid subscriptions for exclusive AR lenses. This allows creators to monetize their AR effects directly on the Snapchat platform.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's nine new ice cream flavours to see which one is best
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new ice cream flavors, including 'Monster Cookie Crunch', 'Red Velvet', 'Movie Night', and 'Birthday Cake'. A shopper tested the ice cream and rated 'Nutoka' ice cream 9/10 and 'cherry bakewell' 8.5/10 as favorite.

articles.title: TNL Mediagene announces adoption of AWS AI services
articles.author: Tip Ranks
articles.summary: TNL Mediagene (TNMG) is adopting Amazon (AMZN) Web Services AI services. This adoption aims to strengthen cross-border content creation and improve publishing efficiency. It sets a new standard for media collaboration across different regions.

articles.title: Liminal Launches Scout to Turn Market Intelligence Into GTM Action
articles.author: Liminal Strategy
articles.summary: Liminal launched Scout, a new product module within its Link platform. Scout connects market, competitor, product, and buyer intelligence. This enables account-based marketing and outbound campaigns for pipeline growth.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launched: Check price, specifications, variants, camera, features, and battery
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 15 in China in October 2025, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 7,300mAh battery with 120W fast charging, and a redesigned camera module. The OnePlus Ace 6 was also announced, equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Extreme Edition processor and a 7,800mAh battery, with expectations of a global release as the OnePlus 15R.

articles.title: Next gen Xbox will play all old console games and have free online says source
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing a new Xbox console, expected to launch in the next couple of years, resembling a high-end PC with Windows OS and access to third-party storefronts like Steam. In partnership with AMD, the new Xbox is expected to run Xbox Series X games, original Xbox, Xbox 360, and Xbox One games, potentially without charging for online multiplayer.

articles.title: New Renault Duster 2026 - Engine, Performance, Features And Tech Expectation
articles.summary: Renault is launching a new, more advanced Duster SUV anticipated on January 26, 2016. The new Duster is expected to have a 1.2-litre, 3-cylinder mild hybrid petrol engine delivering 130 horsepower and will feature technologies like Lane Keeping Assist, a 10.1-inch touchscreen with wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto.

articles.title: Google's Search Ads Still Work. The Question is, How Well and For How Long?
articles.author: Mike Shields
articles.summary: Google is exploring new ways to introduce ads earlier in the user's search journey through AI-powered search. Comcast is focusing on attracting DTC brands and SMB advertisers to TV by rethinking TV ad strategies and offering new ad opportunities, including repurposing social ads for TV.

articles.title: BYD's premium sportscar spotted testing at iconic track in Germany
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: BYD's Denza brand is preparing to launch the new electric sports car, Denza Z, with a prototype undergoing testing at the Nürburgring. The Denza Z will feature technologies such as the DiSus-M suspension system, a foldable steering wheel, and a steer-by-wire system. BYD had launched Yangwang U9, sports car with quad-motor drivetrain, in 2023.

articles.title: I tested Hotel Chocolat's New Velvetiser to find out if it's as good as they say, or mere froth
articles.author: Silvana Franco
articles.summary: Hotel Chocolat has launched the All-New Velvetiser, an updated version of their hot chocolate maker, originally launched in 2018. This new model adds the capability to produce both hot and cold chocolate-based drinks. The machine features a unique jug design and a custom-designed whisk to create a high-density chocolate crema.

articles.title: I tried all of Aldi's nine new ice cream flavours and one is easily the best
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new ice cream flavors including 'Monster Cookie Crunch', 'Red Velvet', 'Movie Night', and 'Birthday Cake'. A food reviewer on TikTok tasted and rated the new flavors, highlighting 'Nutoka' and 'Cherry Bakewell' as favorites.

articles.title: Barclays customers with 3 accounts can get £200 payments with app settings change
articles.author: Nicholas Dawson
articles.summary: Barclays is offering up to £900 in cash payments for new customers who switch to them. This includes £200 for switching to a Barclays Bank Account or £400 for switching to a Premier Current Account, plus up to £500 for moving over ISA savings. To qualify, customers must use the Current Account Switch Service by November 27, meet deposit requirements, and may need to reinstall the Barclays app.

articles.title: Levi's Rolls Out New Premium Denim, but Aims to Keep Appealing to Budget Shoppers
articles.author: Upworthy
articles.summary: Levi's recently launched its Blue Tab collection of denim products. This collection complements existing lines, some of which retail for around $20.

articles.title: Keep your files safe and secure with these latest SSD storage devices
articles.summary: The article introduces several new portable SSDs from brands such as SanDisk, Crucial, Transcend, Kingston, EVM, Samsung, WD, Amazon Basics and Lexar. These SSDs offer various features like high-speed data transfer, durability, portability, and encryption, catering to different user needs such as professional content creation, gaming, and everyday storage. Specific models highlighted include the SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD, Crucial X9, Samsung T9 and Lexar Professional Go, each with unique selling points like water resistance, ultra-fast speeds, and versatile connectivity.

articles.title: OnScent® Launches ScentRadar™: A Generative AI Platform Redefining Fragrance Trend Forecasting
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: OnScent launched ScentRadar, an AI-powered market intelligence platform. ScentRadar analyzes consumer data from various platforms to predict fragrance trends. OnScent empowers perfumers and marketers to anticipate consumer preferences using ScentRadar's insights.

articles.title: 10 things to know about shopping at Aldi before Thursday's grand opening in Beaufort
articles.author: Anna Claire Miller
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new store in Beaufort and the first 100 customers will receive a gift bag with Aldi products and a gift card. The store offers Aldi-exclusive brands, organic meats, fresh produce, gourmet cheeses, and sustainable seafood. Aldi will replace the product and issue a refund under its 'twice as nice' guarantee with receipt.

articles.title: OnScent® Launches ScentRadar™: A Generative AI Platform Redefining Fragrance Trend Forecasting
articles.author: On Scent
articles.summary: OnScent launched ScentRadar, an AI-powered market intelligence platform that decodes consumer behavior and fragrance trends. The platform analyzes data from various sources, including Reddit, Amazon, and TikTok, to build fragrances based on consumer preferences.

articles.title: Livestreaming boosts walnut industry in SW China's Yunnan
org: Dali Feiyi Supply Chain Co., Ltd.
articles.summary: Dali Feiyi Supply Chain Co., Ltd. was established and launched livestream e-commerce, achieving significant sales. Dali Yangbi Wannong Food Co., Ltd. operates high-speed production lines, reaching an annual beverage output of 100,000 tonnes and innovating new products like walnut sauce through research and development.

articles.title: Acer and Metropolitan redefine innovation: Next@Acer 2025 showcases the future of technology in Sri Lanka
articles.summary: Metropolitan Technologies, the authorized distributor for Acer in Sri Lanka, unveiled Acer's latest lineup of next-generation laptops and AI-powered devices, including the Acer Swift Air, Acer Swift Edge 14 AI, Swift 14 AI, Predator Helios Neo 16 AI and Predator Helios 18 AI. The new products are available at Metropolitan MCentre branches, authorized dealer points islandwide and online at https://mcentre.lk/.

articles.title: BT considers launching new budget mobile brand
articles.summary: BT is considering launching a new budget mobile brand. The potential new brand would complement BT's existing premium EE offering. BT is exploring options that involve acquiring an existing MVNO or launching a completely new brand.

articles.title: 特斯拉'擎天柱'机器人亮相纽约街头：身后插着充电器，给路过民众发糖果_手机网易网
articles.author: 新京报
articles.summary: Tesla's 'Optimus' robot made a public appearance in New York, handing out candy to people. The robot, still under development, learns new tasks through human language. Tesla has previously released videos of 'Optimus' dancing and doing chores.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: Better than the rest
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, the first foldable phone with an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, featuring a new gear-less hinge for improved durability. The phone runs on Android 16 and incorporates AI powered by Google Gemini, and includes a one-year free Gemini Pro subscription for buyers. It is available in India for Rs 1,72,999 with 256GB storage.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz India, Zoho partner to launch decentralised dealer management system
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz India and Zoho have launched SKYLine, a new system designed to digitize the entire service process for luxury vehicles.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launched: Check price, specifications, variants, camera, features, and battery
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: OnePlus has unveiled its new flagship phone, the OnePlus 15, featuring a redesigned.

articles.title: PlayStation exclusives on Xbox? Microsoft's next-gen console may change everything: Check likely features, specs, price, and launch timeline
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing a next-generation Xbox console designed to merge console and PC gaming experiences, anticipated to launch in 2027. The new Xbox will feature a full version of Windows, a TV-optimized interface, and support games from PlayStation, Steam, Battle.net, and the entire Xbox library, including backward compatibility.

articles.title: Renault Duster Comeback Soon in India, Teased To Debut on January 26, 2026; Check Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Renault India has confirmed the launch of the new-generation Duster model in India on January 26, 2026. The new Duster will enter India's midsize SUV segment and is expected to be powered by a 1.3-litre HR13 turbo-petrol engine.

articles.title: New-gen Renault Duster to debut on Republic Day: Top 5 things you must know
articles.author: Paarth Khatri
articles.summary: Renault is set to launch the new generation Duster SUV in India on January 26, 2026. The 2026 Renault Duster will be built on Renault's CMF-B platform. The new Duster will compete with Hyundai Creta, Kia Seltos, Skoda Kushaq and Maruti Grand Vitara.

articles.title: Introducing DJI's Romo: A First Look at the Innovative Robot Vacuum
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: DJI has launched the DJI Romo, a robotic vacuum cleaner, in Europe. The Romo features vacuuming and mopping capabilities with a transparent design and advanced navigation system. It's available in three models: Romo P (€1,899), Romo A (€1,599), and Romo S (€1,299), now purchasable across Europe via store.dji.com.

articles.title: Lava Mobiles Teases Launch of Upcoming Smartphone in India: See Details
articles.summary: Lava, an Indian smartphone brand, has teased the upcoming launch of a new smartphone device via its official X handle. The device is expected to arrive in the Indian market soon, as indicated by the 'SOON' tagline in the teaser poster.

articles.title: Final Results Presentation 2025 (Ultimate Products plc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Ultimate Products presented their Full Year Results 2025. The report highlights a new product capable of handling "muddy footprints to sticky jam", suggesting a cleaning or home solution offering.

articles.title: A new book suggests that brands should offer bespoke services to build a loyal customer base
articles.author: Rajeev Roy
articles.summary: Oatly, initially focused on baristas, created a plant-based milk alternative that foamed like dairy, leading to its success. SkinKraft offers AI-driven personalized skincare routines. Nike By You allows customers to customize their shoes, and Royal Enfield provides customization options for motorcycles from the factory.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold may launch in only these countries: Here's the full list
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z TriFold, their first tri-folding smartphone, is expected to debut at the APEC 2025 summit, held from October 31 to November 1, 2025. The introduction of the device was initially anticipated alongside the Galaxy XR at Samsung's Galaxy Event on October 21.

articles.title: ABL, a style commerce platform operated by ABL Corporation, announced on the 28th that it will promo..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: ABL Corporation, operating a style commerce platform, is launching its own beauty brand (PB) business. This PB model emphasizes collaboration with partners, with ABL handling production, inventory, and marketing. The brand mainly targets the 1020 generation and involves establishing a 'PB exclusive hall' to enhance exposure and consumer engagement.

articles.title: Renault Confirms New Duster SUV Unveil Date For India - Here Are The Details
articles.summary: Renault is preparing to launch the new Duster on January 26, 2026, which will be the first vehicle under Renault's 'International Game Plan 2027'. The new Duster will retain its iconic heritage while incorporating a modern design, advanced technology, and enhanced performance. Renault has also opened a waiting program for those eager to experience the SUV's return.

articles.title: ⚡Moto X70 Air May Launch Soon in India; Check Details
articles.summary: Motorola is set to launch the Moto X70 Air smartphone in India, which is expected to be globally released as the Motorola Edge 70 on November 5. The device is anticipated to feature a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, a 6.7-inch 120Hz display, and a 50MP triple camera system.

articles.title: BT Group Explore Launch of Budget UK Mobile Brand to Complement EE
articles.summary: BT is considering launching a new low-cost mobile service brand. This new brand would complement their existing premium EE service. The move mirrors strategies used by Three UK with Smarty and Vodafone with VOXI.

articles.title: Inside the event where Mzansi's stars met HONOR's newest phone
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X7d 5G in Johannesburg, featuring a 50MP camera, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3, and 24GB RAM equivalent performance. The phone includes AI features, 5-star Drop Protection, IP65 Water Resistance and a 6500mAh battery, available from November 1st at R3 999.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: New Einstein Bros. Bagels coming to Humble, Texas
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Baker Katz is supporting the growth of Einstein Bros. Bagels by securing seven leases for new locations in the greater Houston area. Humble will soon welcome a new Einstein Bros. Bagels location at Townsen Crossing, enhancing local dining options.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7: the foldable that finally gets it right
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a thinner design, improved hinge, and an 8" inner display. It's powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and includes a triple-lens camera system with a 200MP main camera. The device integrates Galaxy AI for features like real-time translation and AI-powered photo editing.

articles.title: BT Group explores new mobile brand: Report
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: BT Group is considering launching a low-cost mobile brand to compete with new entrants in the UK telecoms market. This move follows announcements from fintech companies like Monzo and Revolut, who have detailed plans for their own mobile virtual network operator services. BT is exploring options including creating a new brand or acquiring a mobile virtual network operator.

articles.title: Top SA Digital Marketing Agency Now Helps Businesses Show Up in ChatGPT
articles.summary: Woww, a digital marketing agency, is launching AI Visibility and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) services. These services help brands improve their visibility and get recommended by AI platforms, ensuring they are recognised and cited by AI systems. Woww offers a comprehensive AI Visibility Audit and AI marketing services for growing SME's and brands.

articles.title: ZTE Nubia Air Now Available in Romania: Explore the Latest Tech Arrival!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: ZTE Nubia Air is now available in Romania through major retailers and online stores, with prices starting around 2500 RON. The phone features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor, up to 16GB of RAM, a versatile camera system, and a 5000mAh battery with fast charging. The Nubia Air is positioned as a high-performance device with a stunning display and 5G connectivity, competing with models like Samsung Galaxy A54 and Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro+.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: North Branford 'Thrilled To Welcome" iHeart Homes Real Estate To Northford Center: Town Manager
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest, after investing billions to improve its network from big cities to small towns. Also iHeart Homes Real Estate brokerage aims to provide a personal and stress-free home buying experience.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launched With Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset; Check Display, Camera, Battery, Price And Other Features
articles.author: Ankur Mishra
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 15 smartphone in China, featuring Android's 'Touch Display Sync' technology and a new Glacier Cooling System. The smartphone includes a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, and a 7300 mAh battery with 120 W Super Flash Charge and 50 W wireless charging, with prices starting at CNY 3999.

articles.title: Singer unveils HONOR magic V5
articles.author: LBO
articles.summary: Singer Sri Lanka PLC and HONOR have launched the HONOR Magic V5, a foldable smartphone, in Sri Lanka. The phone features a slim design, dual HDR displays with pen support, and an AI-driven experience. It is priced at Rs. 599,000 and available through Singer showrooms and online.

articles.title: Nusign Global Launch Event Concludes Successfully, Embarking on a New International Chapter
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Nusign, a brand under Deli Group, launched its global brand and a new product matrix at an event in Ninghai, China. The new product lines include the 'Master Series', 'Sunshine Whisper', 'Natural Fluid', 'Classic Series', and 'PUZZLE Series', which target learning, work, and home life scenarios and emphasize minimalist aesthetics and practical functionality.

articles.title: La princesse Élisabeth de Belgique, en bleu roi et diamants pour sa photo officielle d'anniversaire
articles.author: Isaac Bickerstaff
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. To promote this new product line, the company is partnering with an agency to target advertising towards wealthy young parents or couples by creating user profiles.

articles.title: BT Group explores new mobile brand, FT reports
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: BT Group is considering launching a low-cost mobile brand, potentially through creating a new brand or acquiring a mobile virtual network operator. This move is motivated by competition from new entrants like Revolut and Monzo, who are launching their own mobile services in the UK and Europe.

articles.title: Singer Unveils HONOR Magic V5, Redefining Foldable Flagship Smartphones
articles.summary: Singer Sri Lanka PLC and HONOR launched the HONOR Magic V5, a new foldable smartphone, in Sri Lanka. Priced at Rs. 599,000, the device is available at Singer showrooms, authorized resellers, and online. The HONOR Magic V5 boasts a thin foldable design, dual HDR displays with pen support, AI-driven multitasking capabilities, and a 64MP Ultra Sensing Periscope Telephoto Camera.

articles.title: NordVPN makes big change and blocks UK households' access to porn
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: NordVPN has introduced a new feature that allows users to block pornography from their devices.  This feature, part of the Threat Protection suite, blocks thousands of adult domains and can be manually turned on. The goal is to protect users from unwanted content, especially on mobile devices.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset And 50MP Triple Cameras Launched: Price, Specs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 15 in China, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 50MP triple rear camera system, and Android 16-based ColorOS 16. The phone includes a 7,300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless fast charging. OnePlus also announced the OnePlus Ace 6 with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 165Hz AMOLED display and a 7,800mAh battery.

articles.title: CelcomDigi launches Spark, a new eSIM-only brand with plans starting from RM15 a month
articles.author: Christopher Fam
articles.summary: CelcomDigi launched Spark, a new eSIM-only telco brand, featuring digital activation and subscription management via a mobile app. Spark offers three monthly mobile plans: Mini (3GB 4G data for RM15), Standard (40GB 5G/4G data for RM25), and Plus (200GB 5G/4G data for RM65). Existing Yoodo customers will be automatically migrated to Spark.

articles.title: OnePlus Ace 6 Turbo Full Specifications Leaked Ahead of Launch
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the Ace 6 Turbo smartphone, codenamed 'Macan,' designed for gaming enthusiasts. It features a 6.7-inch OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor, and an 8,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging. The phone is expected to launch in China before the end of 2025 and may also be released in India.

articles.title: M&S shoppers can get £10 bath gift set with L'Occitane, NEOM & more
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: M&S offers the Bath Body Box, which includes products from NEOM, Apothecary, L'Occitane, Bloom & Blossom, Dr. Paw Paw, This Works and Nuxe, for a discounted price of £9.38 for new TopCashback and M&S customers via a cashback offer. Existing customers can get it for £9.79. Rituals also offers 'Gift Set M' at a reduced price of £35.12.

articles.title: Video: Volkswagen ID Buzz GTX review with Sarah Aubrey
articles.author: Sam Parkinson
articles.summary: The Driven and Electrify This present a detailed review of the new Volkswagen ID Buzz GTX. The review highlights new features including a smart glass roof, clever storage solutions, and iconic two-tone design.

articles.title: Catalent Debuts New Corporate Brand, Elevating Customer Service Excellence by 'Championing the Missions that Matter™' (Catalent Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Catalent has debuted a new corporate brand aimed at elevating customer service excellence. The new brand champions the company's focus on "Missions that Matter™."

articles.title: Hobby Lobby's Push N' Whisk is The Kitchen Hack Everyone Needs
articles.author: Jim Hoffman
articles.summary: Hobby Lobby introduced the Sage Push N' Whisk, a $7 kitchen tool designed to automate whisking with a simple push. Its design includes a sage-green silicone grip and BPA-free, dishwasher-safe components, while its 14.5-inch length provides leverage for various mixing tasks. The product is versatile for everyday cooking and is offered at an affordable price.

articles.title: Microsoft's next Xbox will play every game you've ever bought
articles.summary: Microsoft's next-generation Xbox console will be a premium gaming experience running a full version of Windows. It will support games from rival platforms like Sony PlayStation and Steam, giving players access to decades of content. The new Xbox will also run all games available on the Xbox Series X|S library.

articles.title: Dato' Sri Aliff Syukri Reflects on His Journey Ahead of Shopee's 10th Anniversary
articles.author: Shopee
articles.summary: Dato' Sri Aliff Syukri, founder of Shahida D'Herbs and Shopee brand ambassador, is planning to introduce new products across food and household categories.  He aims to serve his Malaysian customers better through this expansion, continuing his relationship with Shopee.  He also leverages Shopee platform for promotion of his product.

articles.title: From infrastructure to intelligence: Why marketing now shapes the future of electrical and automation
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 28
articles.summary: Schneider Electric embraces industry evolution through the EcoStruxure Automation Expert solution, designed to provide enhanced agility and performance at scale. The company focuses on communicating these advancements with clarity, demystifying complex innovation, and building trust among decision-makers. Their marketing approach focuses on shaping customer understanding and enabling accelerated digital adoption.

articles.title: 36 TikTok-Approved Beauty Products
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Maybelline introduced Lifter Glaze Oil Balm, a moisturizing lip balm with glossy sheen. Philips Norelco launched OneBlade Intimate razor for shaving sensitive areas. Laneige released Neo Blurring Powder for mattifying skin and controlling oil. These and other companies like Color Wow, EOS, CND, Londontown, Saltair, Olay, Gold Bond, Kahi, Touchland, Mise En Scéne, Tonymoly, Skala, Kiss, Elizavecca, Clean Skin Club, Bio-Collagen, K-18, E.l.f, Mane Club, Catrice, and I Dew Care have introduced new beauty and personal care products including hair serums, body oils, masks, and sanitizers.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launched in China with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, 7,300mAh battery: Full specs here
articles.summary: OnePlus has introduced the OnePlus 15 smartphone in China, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 7,300mAh battery. The device also includes a new DetailMax imaging engine and is priced starting at 3,999 Yuan. The global rollout, including India, is expected by mid-November.

articles.title: 19 Products For Very Old Stains
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of cleaning products designed to tackle various messes and stains. These include Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Spray for general stains, Wet and Forget shower cleaner for bathtub grime, The Pink Stuff paste for various surfaces, and Grandma's Secret Spot Remover for fabric stains. Other products mentioned are designed for leather, outdoor furniture, concrete, cars, and travel mugs. The products all aim to solve specific cleaning issues effectively.

articles.title: The end of the rip-off economy
articles.author: The Economist
articles.summary: CarEdge uses an AI negotiator to haggle vehicle prices, while Pruvo monitors refundable hotel bookings, rebooking when rates drop. Clio, a software firm, found over half of consumers have or would use AI to answer legal questions, showing new services leveraging AI to assist consumers.

articles.title: Samsung Tri-Fold Phone: New Dual-Hinge Tablet Unveiled
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is unveiling a tri-fold phone with two hinges and a tablet-sized display, building on its foldable successes. The company's new device aims to increase screen real estate for multitasking, enhance content consumption, and offer a more immersive user experience. The rollout of the tri-fold phone may initially exclude the US market.

articles.title: LG Electronics showcases immersive OLED chandelier at APEC event
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. showcased a concept of bon voyage metaverse, aiming to provide a new travel experience for customers at home.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil trifold smartphone at APEC CEO Summit event
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. will display its new trifoldi.

articles.title: Microsoft's Next Xbox to Run Full Windows With TV-Optimised Shell
articles.author: Alex Harrington
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing the next Xbox as a premium console running full Windows with a TV-optimized, console-style shell. This approach aims to broaden software support and game types, potentially allowing players to use Xbox/Game Pass as well as services like Steam. A current example is the ROG Xbox Ally, which presents an Xbox-like interface but can switch to Windows.

articles.title: The 2025 Augustinus Bader Advent calendar is worth $881
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Augustinus Bader has launched the "12 Days of Bader Advent Calendar for 2025," a limited-edition calendar retailing for $675. It includes travel-size versions of award-winning formulas like The Rich Cream, The Serum, The Retinol Serum and The Eye Cream, all powered by its signature TFC8 technology.

articles.title: From rite of passage to style statement: How Titan is reinventing the Indian wristwatch
articles.author: Anushka Jha
articles.summary: Titan has launched its Stellar series of watches, including Stellar 1 in 2023, Stellar 2 in 2024, and Stellar 3 planned for 2025.  Each edition evolves, with Stellar 3 pushing into mechanical mastery and India's first Wandering Hours complication, priced up to Rs 179,995. Titan's marketing strategy includes a 40-40-20 media mix of traditional, digital, and on-ground visibility.

articles.title: CelcomDigi Unveils Spark - a Malaysia's first eSIM-Only, App-Powered Mobile Experience (Celcomdigi Bhd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: CelcomDigi Berhad introduces Spark, a new digital-first mobile experience. Spark is an eSIM-only, app-powered service designed for customer freedom and evolving digital lifestyles, enabling instant sign-up and activation.

articles.title: CelcomDigi launches Spark, a new eSIM-only brand with plans starting from RM15 a month
articles.author: The Star
articles.summary: CelcomDigi launched Spark, a new eSIM-only telco brand. Spark offers digital activation, subscription, and account management through its mobile app.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launched: Price, top specs, key features and everything else to know
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: OnePlus launched a new product. Key details include the price and specifications.

articles.title: Arelion launches new PoP in Oklahoma City, expanding connectivity to North American AI Superhighway
articles.author: Vermillion Plain Talk
articles.summary: Arelion launched a new service.

articles.title: The 16 Most Affordable Skin-Care Products Wirecutter Recommends
articles.summary: Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser is fragrance-free and sulfate-free and cleanses without causing tightness, dryness, or redness. Neutrogena Skin Balancing Gel Cleanser contains a mild hydroxy acid and a hint of aloe, leaving skin soft, smooth, and cool. La Roche-Posay Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Cleanser is a mild milky formula that helps skin maintain moisture. Cetaphil Gentle Clear Mattifying Acne Moisturizer is a lightweight, mattifying lotion enhanced with a low concentration of blemish-fighting salicylic acid.  L'Oréal Paris Revitalift 0.3% Pure Retinol is a serum with a concentration of 0.3% retinol and Olay Vitamin C + Peptide 24 Brightening Serum has a plump, pearlescent formula that leaves skin soft and smooth. PanOxyl Clarifying Exfoliant 2% Salicylic Acid is a mild mixture that boasts the maximum over-the-counter concentration of 2% salicylic acid. CeraVe Skin Renewing Nightly Exfoliating Treatment contains glycolic and lactic acids to smooth skin. Banana Boat Light As Air SPF 50+ blends well on a range of skin tones and has a nice, breezy scent. Aquaphor Lip Repair Sitck + Sunscreen remains solid in summer heat and stays smooth and spreadable in cold weather.

articles.title: The Next Xbox Has One Unique, Overlooked Concept
articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.summary: Microsoft is reportedly developing a new Xbox device, effectively an Xbox Gaming PC, that merges PC and console concepts, allowing users to run multiple storefronts and Xbox console games. This new device might not require an 'Xbox Game Pass Core' subscription for online play, potentially impacting Microsoft's subscription revenue model.

articles.title: NVIDIA Open Sources Aerial Software to Accelerate AI-Native 6G (Nvidia Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: NVIDIA is releasing NVIDIA Aerial software as open source to aid the telecom industry in building AI-native 5G and 6G networks. The software will be accessible on NVIDIA platforms, including NVIDIA DGX Spark.

articles.title: Woman-Owned Lani's Garden LLC Launches Small-Batch Skincare Line Prioritizing Trust and Ingredient Transparency
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Lani's Garden LLC, a new skincare brand, enters the clean beauty market, emphasizing purity, transparency, and trust in its products.

articles.title: Adobe launches AI audio, video and photo tools across Express, Firefly and Creative Cloud; brings Firefly Image Model 5, Google's Nano Banana and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Adobe has launched new AI-powered creative tools across its product ecosystem, including Adobe Express and Creative Cloud applications. The launch was announced at Adobe MAX 2025, the company's annual creativity conference.

articles.title: Zettlab's Sleek New NAS Uses AI to Find the Photos You Want
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Zettlab, a Shenzhen-based startup, has announced the launch of D6 Ultra and D4 NAS, two new AI-infused storage solutions designed for digital content creators. The company was founded by former engineers from DJI, Huawei, and ByteDance.

articles.title: This German Laundry Detergent Is Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Huffington Post
articles.summary: A new scent product promises to deliver a fresh, vibrant fragrance that lasts on clothes for days.
